activities.title: Regular Services
activities.description: Daily tuitions and Bala Vikas activities in the villages. Daily afternoon meals to elderly and differently-abled individuals in villages.

2025: Started daily afternoon meal program in Nagayya Peta
Expanded Bala Vikas sessions in Pedanandipally
2024: Launched tuition support for children in Kasi Puram

activities.title: Other Services
activities.description: Temple development, school development, village sanitation, devotional cultural activities, and medical assistance to the needy.

2023: Devotional cultural programs conducted across villages
